en: When did you visit Kyoto last?
zh: 你上次是什么时候去京都的？

en: How long has it been since we last met?
zh: 我们上次见面有多久了？

en: It is a long time since I saw you last.
zh: 好久不见了。

en: She looked well when I last saw her.
zh: 我上次见到她的时候，她看起来气色很好。

en: Don't let me down as you did the other day.
zh: 别像上次那样让我失望。

en: Start reading where you left off.
zh: 从你上次停下的地方开始读。

en: Where did we leave off last time?
zh: 我们上次讲到哪里了？

en: Several houses were damaged in the last storm.
zh: 上次暴风雨中，几栋房子受损。

en: I haven't seen him since last Sunday.
zh: 我从上周日之后就没见过他了。

en: That girl couldn't take things down in longhand, let alone shorthand.
zh: 那个女孩连手写都记不下来，更别说速记了。

en: I spent last Sunday reading novels.
zh: 我上周日都在看小说。

en: It happened that I was free last Sunday.
zh: 碰巧我上周日有空。

en: I remember riding home on a pickup truck last Sunday.
zh: 我记得上周日我搭着一辆皮卡车回家的。

en: Last Sunday, Mary and I went to the library together.
zh: 上周日，玛丽和我一起去了图书馆。

en: Mother bought me a nice dress last Sunday.
zh: 上周日妈妈给我买了一件漂亮的连衣裙。

en: I went skiing at Zao last winter.
zh: 去年冬天我去藏王滑雪了。

en: I went skiing in Canada last winter.
zh: 去年冬天我去加拿大滑雪了。

en: Did you go to the last class?
zh: 你上次课去了吗？

en: What was the idea of leaving the cup upside down last time?
zh: 上次你为什么把杯子倒扣着放？

en: How were your last exams?
zh: 你上次的考试怎么样？

en: On my last visit to Kyoto I enjoyed myself very much.
zh: 我上次去京都的时候玩得很开心。

en: The pond dried up last summer.
zh: 池塘去年夏天干涸了。

en: Last summer, I finally left the firm that I had joined twelve years before.
zh: 去年夏天，我终于离开了十二年前加入的那家公司。

en: Last summer I had a chance to visit London.
zh: 去年夏天我有机会去伦敦玩。

en: The last time I called him, he was out.
zh: 我上次给他打电话的时候，他不在家。

en: Their food was great last time.
zh: 他们上次的食物很棒。

en: I found that she wore the same dress that I had seen her wear last time.
zh: 我发现她穿了上次我见她穿过的那件连衣裙。

en: The last time I saw Kent, he was very well.
zh: 我上次见到肯特的时候，他精神很好。

en: You seem to have made considerable progress since I saw you last.
zh: 自从上次见到你，你似乎取得了很大的进步。

en: Do you remember when I saw you last?
zh: 你还记得我上次见到你是什么时候吗？

en: The other day I ran out of gas in the middle of a busy Interstate.
zh: 前几天我在繁忙的州际公路上汽油耗尽了。

en: I name this ship the Queen Elizabeth.
zh: 我命名这艘船为伊丽莎白女王号。

en: This ship is driven by steam.
zh: 这艘船由蒸汽驱动。

en: This ship is too big to pass through the canal.
zh: 这艘船太大了，无法通过运河。

en: This ship is not fit for an ocean voyage.
zh: 这艘船不适合远洋航行。

en: This ship is bound for Vancouver.
zh: 这艘船开往温哥华。

en: This boat goes through the jungle.
zh: 这条船穿过丛林。

en: This boat sails through the Strait of Gibraltar.
zh: 这条船航行穿过直布罗陀海峡。

en: What's the destination of this ship?
zh: 这艘船的目的地是哪里？

en: The length of this ship is 30 meters.
zh: 这艘船的长度是30米。

en: Divide this line into twenty equal parts.
zh: 把这条线分成二十个相等的部分。

en: This line represents the longitude.
zh: 这条线代表经度。

en: This line is parallel to the other.
zh: 这条线与另一条线平行。

en: This line is parallel to that.
zh: 这条线与那条线平行。

en: Where is the end of this line?
zh: 这条线的末端在哪里？

en: This line marks your height.
zh: 这条线标明你的身高。

en: This diver's watch is a little too expensive.
zh: 这款潜水表有点太贵了。

en: This stain won't come out.
zh: 这个污渍洗不掉。

en: You can't use this washing machine.
zh: 你不能用这台洗衣机。

en: Something is wrong with this washing machine.
zh: 这台洗衣机出问题了。

en: This stopper does not fit the bottle.
zh: 这个塞子不适合这个瓶子。

en: Could you tell me how to use this washing machine?
zh: 你能告诉我怎么用这个洗衣机吗？

en: This battle left Napoleon master of Europe.
zh: 这场战役使拿破仑成为欧洲的主人。

en: This river is dangerous to swim in.
zh: 这条河游泳很危险。

en: Can you swim across this river?
zh: 你能游过这条河吗？

en: This river is beautiful.
zh: 这条河很漂亮。

en: This river flows south into the sea.
zh: 这条河向南流入大海。

en: This river is going to overflow.
zh: 这条河要泛滥了。

en: This river rises in the mountains in Nagano.
zh: 这条河发源于长野的山区。

en: This river is 500 miles in length.
zh: 这条河有500英里长。

en: This river sometimes overflows after the thaw.
zh: 这条河在解冻后有时会泛滥。

en: This river extends for hundreds of miles.
zh: 这条河绵延数百英里。

en: This river is about one third as long as the Shinano.
zh: 这条河的长度大约是信浓川的三分之一。

en: This river runs through my village.
zh: 这条河流经我的村庄。

en: This river is dangerous for children to swim in.
zh: 这条河对孩子们来说游泳很危险。

en: This river is polluted with factory waste.
zh: 这条河被工厂废水污染了。

en: What is the name of this river?
zh: 这条河叫什么名字？

en: This river is not polluted.
zh: 这条河没有被污染。

en: This river is deep enough to swim in.
zh: 这条河足够深，可以游泳。

en: The river flows too fast to swim in.
zh: 这条河水流太急，不能游泳。

en: This river is very dangerous to swim in.
zh: 这条河游泳非常危险。

en: This river flows too fast to swim in.
zh: 这条河水流太急，不能游泳。

en: This river is dangerous to swim across.
zh: 这条河游过去很危险。

en: This river is safe to swim in.
zh: 这条河游泳是安全的。

en: The river is the widest in Europe.
zh: 这条河是欧洲最宽的河。

en: This river is deepest here.
zh: 这条河在这里最深。

en: This river runs into Lake Ontario.
zh: 这条河流入安大略湖。

en: This river is three times longer than that one.
zh: 这条河的长度是那条河的三倍。

en: This river becomes shallow at that point.
zh: 这条河在那一点变得很浅。

en: This river is dangerous to swim in, in July.
zh: 七月份在这条河里游泳很危险。

en: The current of this river is rapid.
zh: 这条河的水流很急。

en: How wide is this river?
zh: 这条河有多宽？

en: This river is one mile across.
zh: 这条河有一英里宽。

en: The water in this river is very clean.
zh: 这条河里的水非常干净。

en: This river is so polluted that fish can no longer live in it.
zh: 这条河污染太严重了，鱼都无法生存了。

en: There is a bridge about one kilometer up this river.
zh: 这条河上游约一公里处有一座桥。

en: That bridge across this river is the oldest in the town.
zh: 那座横跨这条河的桥是镇上最古老的桥。

en: This river abounds in small fish.
zh: 这条河里有很多小鱼。

en: This river abounds in trout.
zh: 这条河里有很多鳟鱼。

en: The fish caught in this river are all nice.
zh: 在这条河里捕到的鱼都很好。

en: The number of fish caught in this river was very small.
zh: 在这条河里捕到的鱼的数量非常少。

en: It's dangerous to swim in this river.
zh: 在这条河里游泳很危险。

en: Is it safe to swim in this river?
zh: 在这条河里游泳安全吗？

en: Swimming is not allowed in this river.
zh: 这条河里不允许游泳。

en: This technical journal is above me.
zh: 这本技术期刊我看不懂。

en: Can you break this thousand-yen bill?
zh: 你能把这张一千日元的钞票找开吗？

en: This heirloom shall be yours.
zh: 这件传家宝将是你的。

en: This teacher goes by the name of "Pops."
zh: 这位老师的名字是“老爹”。

en: Danger ahead.
zh: 前方危险。

en: None of us knows what is in store for us.
zh: 我们谁也不知道未来会发生什么。

en: I can't write with this dull pencil.
zh: 这支铅笔太钝了，我没法用它写字。

en: The road ahead is frozen.
zh: 前面的路面结冰了。

en: What will come?
zh: 未来会发生什么？

en: You are mad to go out in the snow without a coat.
zh: 你不穿外套就出去，你疯了吗？

en: The trains are running in this snow.
zh: 火车在这种雪天还在运行。

en: Take this folding umbrella with you. It might come in handy.
zh: 带上这把折叠伞。它可能会派上用场。

en: Can I cancel this ticket?
zh: 我可以取消这张票吗？

en: You may give this ticket to whoever wants it.
zh: 你可以把这张票给任何想要它的人。

en: This is a free ticket.
zh: 这是一张免费票。

en: This ticket allows you to stop over at any station.
zh: 这张票允许你在任何车站中途停留。

en: This ticket is good for three days.
zh: 这张票有效期三天。

en: This ticket holds good only for two days after purchase.
zh: 这张票自购买之日起仅两天内有效。

en: This ticket holds good for a month.
zh: 这张票有效期一个月。

en: This ticket is good for one more week.
zh: 这张票还能用一个星期。

en: Could you change the departure date for this ticket?
zh: 可以更改这张票的出发日期吗？

en: The ticket admits two persons.
zh: 这张票可以供两个人使用。

en: Can I see the special exhibit with this ticket?
zh: 我可以用这张票看特别展览吗？

en: This ticket will admit two persons free.
zh: 这张票可以免费让两个人入场。

en: This ticket admits two persons.
zh: 这张票可以供两个人使用。

en: I'll give you either of these stamps.
zh: 这两张邮票，我随便给你一张。

en: Whose image is on this stamp?
zh: 这张邮票上是谁的头像？

en: The red kills the whole pattern.
zh: 红色破坏了整个图案。

en: The baby cannot use a spoon yet.
zh: 这个婴儿还不会用勺子。

en: Is this baby a he or a she?
zh: 这个婴儿是男孩还是女孩？

en: This baby is 3 weeks old.
zh: 这个婴儿3周大了。

en: This red hat corresponds well to her dress.
zh: 这顶红帽子和她的裙子很相配。

en: How much for this red hat?
zh: 这顶红帽子多少钱？

en: You have only to push this red button.
zh: 你只需要按下这个红色按钮。

en: Who is ultimately responsible for this?
zh: 这件事最终由谁负责？

en: This soap will improve her complexion.
zh: 这块肥皂会改善她的肤色。

en: Help me move this stone.
zh: 帮我搬一下这块石头。

en: Can you lift this stone?
zh: 你能举起这块石头吗？

en: This stone is too heavy to lift.
zh: 这块石头太重了，举不起来。

en: This stone is too heavy for me to move.
zh: 这块石头太重了，我搬不动。

en: This stone was so heavy that I could not lift it.
zh: 这块石头太重了，我举不起来。

en: This stone is twice as heavy as that one.
zh: 这块石头比那块重一倍。

en: This stone weighs five tons.
zh: 这块石头重五吨。

en: This stone has a hole in the center.
zh: 这块石头中间有个洞。

en: Will you keep this seat for me?
zh: 你能帮我占着这个座位吗？

en: Will you hold this seat for me?
zh: 你能帮我占着这个座位吗？

en: Can you save this seat for me?
zh: 你能帮我占着这个座位吗？

en: Could you take me to this seat?
zh: 你能带我到这个座位吗？

en: Is this seat taken?
zh: 这个座位有人吗？

en: I hope this seat is not occupied.
zh: 我希望这个座位没人坐。

en: Where's this seat?
zh: 这个座位在哪里？

en: Is this seat empty?
zh: 这个座位是空的吗？

en: I can't see the stage well from this seat.
zh: 我从这个座位看不清舞台。

en: I'm about tired of this quiet life.
zh: 我有点厌倦这种平静的生活了。

en: Hunting game is forbidden in these tranquil woods.
zh: 在这片宁静的树林里禁止狩猎。

en: Hunting game is forbidden in this tranquil wilderness.
zh: 在这片宁静的荒野中禁止狩猎。

en: This blue sweater is very pretty.
zh: 这件蓝色毛衣非常漂亮。

en: The payment of this bill is due today.
zh: 这张账单今天到期。

en: This work is beautifully finished.
zh: 这件作品完成得非常精美。

en: These products are selling like hot cakes.
zh: 这些产品非常畅销。

en: This product is made in Italy.
zh: 这个产品是意大利制造的。

en: These products are superior to theirs.
zh: 这些产品比他们的好。

en: This product brought us a large margin.
zh: 这个产品给我们带来了很大的利润。

en: Please order this product by February 15, and we will be able to deliver it before March 15.
zh: 请在2月15日前订购此产品，我们可以在3月15日前交付。

en: This material is not suitable for a dress.
zh: 这种材料不适合做连衣裙。

en: Each of these students has his or her own opinion.
zh: 这些学生每个人都有自己的看法。

en: This material stretches easily.
zh: 这种材料很容易拉伸。

en: This fabric stains easily.
zh: 这种布料很容易沾污渍。

en: This cloth is superior to that.
zh: 这种布比那种好。

en: This cloth irons well.
zh: 这种布很好熨烫。

en: I want a suit made of this material.
zh: 我想用这种材料做一套西装。

en: I'm going to make this material into a skirt.
zh: 我想用这种材料做一条裙子。

en: I want to buy this material for a new dress. How much does it cost?
zh: 我想买这种材料做一件新连衣裙。多少钱？

en: I'm tired of living this life.
zh: 我厌倦了这种生活。

en: I hope this fine weather lasts till the weekend.
zh: 我希望这种好天气能持续到周末。

en: This government is really putting the clock back.
zh: 这个政府真是在开倒车。

en: This political problem gave rise to hot discussions.
zh: 这个政治问题引起了激烈的讨论。

en: This policy is sure to go a long way towards stimulating business.
zh: 这项政策肯定会在刺激商业方面大有作为。

en: Prices rose drastically as a result of this policy.
zh: 由于这项政策，价格大幅上涨。

en: This system will work well in nine cases out of ten.
zh: 这个系统在十次中有九次都能很好地工作。

en: This system is bristling with defects and drawbacks.
zh: 这个系统充满了缺陷和缺点。

en: There is no room for further improvement in this system.
zh: 这个系统已经没有进一步改进的空间了。

en: We ought to look the world straight in the face.
zh: 我们应该勇敢地面对这个世界。

en: Welcome to this world!
zh: 欢迎来到这个世界！

en: When did the world come into being?
zh: 这个世界是什么时候出现的？

en: If only there were no wars in the world.
zh: 要是世界上没有战争就好了。

en: This world is but canvas to our imaginations.
zh: 这个世界不过是我们想象力的画布。

en: This world is but a place of passage.
zh: 这个世界不过是一个过客之地。

en: There is nothing new under the sun.
zh: 太阳底下无新事。

en: Forget the anxieties of life and learn to relax.
zh: 忘记生活的焦虑，学会放松。

en: The joys of the world do but little.
zh: 世间的欢乐作用甚微。

en: We cannot know everything in the world.
zh: 我们不可能了解世界上的一切。

en: Can you imagine a time when the world is free of war?
zh: 你能想象一个没有战争的世界吗？

en: There is nothing in this world that I am afraid of.
zh: 这个世界上没有什么是我害怕的。

en: The day will come when I cease to be on this earth.
zh: 总有一天我会离开这个世界。

en: I don't have a care in the world.
zh: 我无忧无虑。

en: There's only one pretty child in the world, and every mother has it.
zh: 每个母亲都认为自己的孩子是世界上最漂亮的。

en: What would the world do without tea?
zh: 没有茶，世界会怎么样？

en: Everybody in this world has to cope with a lot of difficulties.
zh: 这个世界上的每个人都必须应对许多困难。

en: The best thing in the world for a man is to choose a good wife, the worst being to mistakenly choose an ill-suited one.
zh: 对男人来说，世界上最好的事是娶一个好妻子，最糟糕的事是错误地选择一个不合适的妻子。

en: I find the great thing in this world is not so much where we stand as in what direction we are moving.
zh: 我发现在这个世界上，重要的不是我们站在哪里，而是我们前进的方向。

en: There is nothing on earth that is not affected by the sun.
zh: 地球上的一切都受到太阳的影响。

en: There is nothing in the world from which we can't learn something.
zh: 世界上没有什么东西是我们不能从中学习的。

en: Nothing is as terrible as losing someone you love in the world.
zh: 没有什么比失去你爱的人更可怕了。

en: We don't know when this world came into being.
zh: 我们不知道这个世界是什么时候出现的。

en: The only thing in the world which one can never receive or give too much is love.
zh: 世界上唯一永远不会嫌多或嫌少的东西就是爱。

en: During these years he wrote immortal poems.
zh: 在这些年里，他写下了不朽的诗篇。

en: This figure is a mirror of the decrease in imports of crude oil.
zh: 这个数字反映了原油进口量的减少。

en: Add up this column of figures.
zh: 把这一列数字加起来。

en: This essay is about a piece of luggage.
zh: 这篇文章是关于一件行李的。

en: This swimming suit is made of elastic material.
zh: 这件游泳衣是用弹性材料做的。

en: It is good to drink this water.
zh: 这水喝起来不错。

en: This water contains a little alcohol.
zh: 这水中含有一点酒精。

en: This water is a little salty.
zh: 这水有点咸。

en: This water is sterilized.
zh: 这水已经消毒了。

en: This water has an ugly smell.
zh: 这水有一股难闻的气味。

en: This water is good to drink.
zh: 这水适合饮用。

en: This water is safe to drink.
zh: 这水可以安全饮用。

en: This water tastes good.
zh: 这水味道很好。

en: I am halfway through this detective story.
zh: 这本侦探小说我读了一半了。

en: There are a great many books in this library.
zh: 这个图书馆里有很多书。

en: This library has a large collection of Chinese books.
zh: 这个图书馆收藏了大量的中文书籍。

en: There are a lot of English books in this library.
zh: 这个图书馆里有很多英文书。

en: Are there any English magazines in this library?
zh: 这个图书馆里有英文杂志吗？

en: This library has over 50,000 volumes.
zh: 这个图书馆藏书超过五万册。

en: At this library, you can borrow up to three books at a time.
zh: 在这个图书馆，你一次最多可以借三本书。

en: The illustration shows the deep interior.
zh: 这幅插图展示了深邃的内部。

en: This chart illustrates the function of ozone layer.
zh: 这张图表说明了臭氧层的功能。

en: This diagram will illustrate what I mean.
zh: 这个图表将说明我的意思。

en: These children are born not of natural descent, nor of human decision or a husband's will, but born of God.
zh: 这些孩子不是从血缘生的，不是从人的意愿生的，也不是从丈夫的意愿生的，乃是从神生的。

en: Did you make this doll by yourself?
zh: 这个娃娃是你自己做的吗？

en: This crowd reminds me of the streets of Tokyo.
zh: 这人群让我想起了东京的街道。

en: This doll belongs to me.
zh: 这个娃娃是我的。

en: This figure is supposed to represent Marilyn Monroe, but I don't think it does her justice.
zh: 这个雕像本应代表玛丽莲·梦露，但我觉得它没有把她的神韵表现出来。

en: This doll costs only sixty cents.
zh: 这个娃娃只卖六毛钱。

en: This doll is a gift from my aunt.
zh: 这个娃娃是我姑妈送的礼物。

zh: 我对此失败负责。

en: This failure is due to your mistake.
zh: 这次失败是由于你的错误造成的。

en: This failure was brought about by your own negligence.
zh: 这次失败是你自己的疏忽造成的。

en: We'll never live this fiasco down.
zh: 我们永远也无法摆脱这次惨败的影响。

en: This turkey will serve five.
zh: 这只火鸡够五个人吃。

en: This increase in unemployment is a consequence of the recession.
zh: 失业率的上升是经济衰退的结果。

en: Would you mind my using this dictionary?
zh: 你介意我用这本词典吗？

en: This turkey tastes good.
zh: 这只火鸡味道很好。

en: Can I use this dictionary?
zh: 我可以用这本词典吗？

en: I'll lend you this dictionary.
zh: 我会把这本词典借给你。

en: This dictionary is of great use.
zh: 这本词典很有用。

en: This dictionary puts a special emphasis on usage.
zh: 这本词典特别强调用法。

en: This dictionary is handy in size.
zh: 这本词典大小很方便携带。

en: You can depend on this dictionary.
zh: 你可以信赖这本词典。

en: This dictionary is useful to beginners, yes, and to advanced learners.
zh: 这本词典对初学者有用，是的，对高级学习者也很有用。

en: This dictionary is my sister's.
zh: 这本词典是我妹妹的。

en: This dictionary doesn't belong to me.
zh: 这本词典不属于我。

en: This dictionary has been of great use to me.
zh: 这本词典对我很有用。

en: This dictionary is of great use to me.
zh: 这本词典对我很有用。

en: This dictionary is of great value to us.
zh: 这本词典对我们很有价值。

en: This dictionary is great boon up to us.
zh: 这本词典对我们来说是极大的帮助。

en: This dictionary is adapted for high school students.
zh: 这本词典适合高中生使用。

en: This dictionary is primarily intended for high school students.
zh: 这本词典主要供高中生使用。

en: This dictionary is expensive.
zh: 这本词典很贵。

en: This dictionary contains about 40,000 headwords.
zh: 这本词典包含大约四万个词条。

en: This dictionary is by far the best.
zh: 这本词典是目前为止最好的。

en: This dictionary is as useful as yours.
zh: 这本词典和你的一样有用。

en: This dictionary is an abridged edition.
zh: 这本词典是简编版。

en: This dictionary is of great use for students.
zh: 这本词典对学生很有用。

en: This dictionary is written in English.
zh: 这本词典是用英语编写的。

en: This dictionary is no good.
zh: 这本词典不好。

en: This dictionary is of little use.
zh: 这本词典没什么用。

en: This dictionary is very expensive, but is worth buying.
zh: 这本词典很贵，但是值得购买。

en: This dictionary contains not more than 20,000 words.
zh: 这本词典包含不超过两万个单词。

en: This dictionary is well adapted for beginners.
zh: 这本词典非常适合初学者。

en: This dictionary is superior to that one.
zh: 这本词典比那本好。

en: This dictionary doesn't go very far.
zh: 这本词典不够全面。

en: This dictionary is every bit as good as that one.
zh: 这本词典和那本一样好。

en: This dictionary is as useful as that one.
zh: 这本词典和那本一样有用。

en: This dictionary has 12 volumes.
zh: 这本词典有12卷。

en: This dictionary, of which the third volume is missing, cost me a hundred dollars.
zh: 这本词典，缺了第三卷，花了我一百美元。

en: The examples in this dictionary are easy to understand.
zh: 这本词典里的例句很容易理解。

en: Every word in this dictionary is important.
zh: 这本词典里的每个词都很重要。

en: Not every word in this dictionary is important.
zh: 这本词典里的每个词并非都很重要。

en: The revision of this dictionary took six years.
zh: 这本词典的修订花了六年时间。

en: There is plenty of room for improvement in this dictionary.
zh: 这本词典还有很大的改进空间。

en: This dictionary contains a lot of information.
zh: 这本词典包含大量信息。

en: This dictionary contains not less than fifty thousand words.
zh: 这本词典收录的词汇不少于五万个。

en: This dictionary has a preface, not a foreword.
zh: 这本词典有的是序言，不是前言。

en: I can't do without this dictionary.
zh: 我离不开这本词典。

en: When you compare this dictionary with that one, you can easily see which is better.
zh: 当你把这本词典和那本词典比较时，你很容易看出哪一本更好。

en: Let's compare this dictionary with that one.
zh: 我们把这本词典和那本词典比较一下吧。

en: Will this dictionary do?
zh: 这本词典能用吗？

en: In this dictionary the pronunciation comes right after the headword.
zh: 在这本词典里，发音紧跟在词条之后。

en: I cannot do without this dictionary.
zh: 我离不开这本词典。

en: This vending machine is out of order.
zh: 这台自动售货机坏了。

en: This vending machine won't accept 500 yen coins.
zh: 这台自动售货机不接受500日元的硬币。

en: This vending machine isn't working.
zh: 这台自动售货机不能用了。

en: This car handles well.
zh: 这辆车操控性很好。

en: This car runs on alcohol.
zh: 这辆车用酒精作燃料。

en: Can I use this bike?
zh: 我能用这辆自行车吗？

en: This bicycle needs oiling.
zh: 这辆自行车需要上油。

en: Whose is this bicycle?
zh: 这辆自行车是谁的？

en: This car is easy to handle.
zh: 这辆车很容易操控。

en: This bike is easy to ride.
zh: 这辆自行车很容易骑。

en: This bicycle needs repairing.
zh: 这辆自行车需要修理。

en: This bicycle belongs to my brother.
zh: 这辆自行车是我弟弟的。

en: This bike is used by my brother.
zh: 这辆自行车是我弟弟用的。

en: This bicycle belongs to me.
zh: 这辆自行车是我的。

en: This bicycle has been left here since the beginning of this month.
zh: 这辆自行车从这个月初就一直放在这里了。

en: This bike is awful; it's too heavy.
zh: 这辆自行车太糟糕了，太重了。

en: Oil this bicycle.
zh: 给这辆自行车上点油。

en: I had a terrible accident riding this bike.
zh: 我骑这辆自行车出了一场可怕的事故。

en: If in this self-portrait I seem to be staring at you, I'm not.
zh: 如果在这张自画像里我看起来像在盯着你看，那不是故意的。

en: The magnetite is attracted to the earth's magnetic field.
zh: 磁铁矿会被地球磁场吸引。

en: The lines of this field run between magnetic north and magnetic south at the two poles.
zh: 这个磁场的磁力线在两极的磁北和磁南之间运行。

en: This remedy will do you good overnight.
zh: 这个疗法会让你一夜之间好起来。

en: Next time I come, I'll bring you some flowers.
zh: 下次我来的时候，我会给你带些花。

en: I will win the game next time.
zh: 下次我一定会赢得比赛。

en: You will be able to sing better next time.
zh: 下次你就能唱得更好了。

en: I will come earlier next time.
zh: 下次我早点来。

en: When can I see you next time?
zh: 下次我什么时候能见到你？

en: I will see you on next Tuesday, that is to say, the 10th of September.
zh: 下次我会在下周二见你，也就是9月10号。

en: Please tell me about your town in your next letter.
zh: 请在你的下一封信里告诉我关于你家乡的事。

en: Please bring me the book next time you come.
zh: 下次你来的时候请把书带来。

en: I will tell him about it when he comes next time.
zh: 下次他来的时候我会告诉他这件事。

en: I will make up for it next time.
zh: 下次我会弥补的。

en: Ask him when to get together next.
zh: 问问他下次什么时候聚。

en: Look me up next time you are in Kyoto.
zh: 下次你来京都的时候，记得来找我。

en: I wanted this watch so badly I could taste it.
zh: 我太想要这块手表了，简直能尝到它的味道。

en: The quality of craftsmanship in this clock company is unsurpassed.
zh: 这家钟表公司的工艺质量是无与伦比的。

en: I would buy this watch, except it's too expensive.
zh: 我很想买这块手表，只是太贵了。

en: I would like to exchange this watch with a cheaper one.
zh: 我想把这块手表换一块便宜一点的。
